Package edu.ma02.core.interfaces

Interface ICityStatistics

public interface ICityStatistics

Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG)
Politécnico do Porto (PP)
Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI)
Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
Paradigmas de Programação (PP)

Contract representing a City statistics

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    IStatistics[] getMeasurementsBySensor​(String stationName, AggregationOperator operator, Parameter parameter)
    Returns a collection of statistics based on the measurements of a sensor
    IStatistics[] getMeasurementsBySensor​(String stationName, AggregationOperator operator, Parameter parameter, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
    Returns a collection of statistics based on the measurements of a sensor and a date interval
    IStatistics[] getMeasurementsByStation​(AggregationOperator operator, Parameter parameter)
    Returns a collection of statistics based on the measurements of a station
    IStatistics[] getMeasurementsByStation​(AggregationOperator operator, Parameter parameter, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
    Returns a collection of statistics based on the measurements per station and a date interval

  • Method Details

    • getMeasurementsByStation

      IStatistics[] getMeasurementsByStation​(AggregationOperator operator, Parameter parameter, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      Returns a collection of statistics based on the measurements per station and a date interval
      Parameters:
      operator - the operator applied to the query
      parameter - the parameter applied to the query
      start - start date for the results
      end - end date for the results
      Returns:
      the collection of statistics

    • getMeasurementsByStation

      IStatistics[] getMeasurementsByStation​(AggregationOperator operator, Parameter parameter)
      Returns a collection of statistics based on the measurements of a station
      Parameters:
      operator - the operator applied to the query
      parameter - the parameter applied to the query
      Returns:
      the collection of statistics

    • getMeasurementsBySensor

      IStatistics[] getMeasurementsBySensor​(String stationName, AggregationOperator operator, Parameter parameter, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      Returns a collection of statistics based on the measurements of a sensor and a date interval
      Parameters:
      stationName - the selected station
      operator - the operator applied to the query
      parameter - the parameter applied to the query
      start - start date for the results
      end - end date for the results
      Returns:
      the collection of statistics

    • getMeasurementsBySensor
